sentences: Natsuko Aso (麻生 夏子, Asō Natsuko) (born August 6, 1990 in Tokyo) is a Japanese actress and singer.
Aso began her career playing the role of Chisame in the Negima drama and as a member of the band pRythme.
Later, she has appeared in a number of TV dramas and began a solo music career.
Her single "Perfect Area Complete" was chosen as the opening song for the Baka to Test to Shōkanjū anime.
She currently presents the second season of Japan In Motion, a show broadcast on the French TV network Nolife.
In 2010 she was a music guest for the French Japan Expo 2010.
In 2011, she made an appearance in the PV for Hyadain's Kakakata Kataomoi-C where she played the role of Hyadain's female counterpart Hyadaruko
In 2012 she was a guest for Hyper Japan in London, and performed in the United States for the first time at Otakon Music Festival in Baltimore with Faylan and JAM Project.
Persona 4 The Ultimate in Mayonaka Arena Stageplay (Rise Kujikawa)
